lead_paragraph: Lazio have appointed former Argentina boss Marcelo Bielsa as their new manager, the Italian club said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Lazio Appoint Argentine Bielsa as New Manager
headline.main: Lazio Appoint Argentine Bielsa as New Manager

snippet: Lazio have appointed former Argentina boss Marcelo Bielsa as their new manager, the Italian club said on Wednesday....
